backend/main.mo: Backend actor handling authorization, user profiles, and CRUD-like project storage with sorting and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high‑level features to related frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of various frontend pages and tool wrappers.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark modes, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining layout and routes for dashboard, projects, and all tool pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Component that blocks access for unauthenticated users and provides a login prompt using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity session state and clearing react‑query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter a name and save their profile using the saveCallerUserProfile hook.
Main layout wrapper providing header, navigation, auth state handling, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/nav/ToolNav.tsx: Renders categorized tool navigation links with icons sourced from the tool registry.
frontend/src/components/tools/HowItWorks: Displays help text for a tool using a standardized card layout.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolConfig: Shows presets and advanced configurable settings for a tool, allowing updates and resets.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolStudio: Central tool workspace managing presets, config, file input, processing, and layout panels.
frontend/src/components/workspace/Worksp: Handles file upload, input requirements, and triggers processing actions based on tool mode.
Composes input, preview, and output panels into the main workspace layout.
Displays processed output with options to download or save a project when authenticated.
Displays an image preview using a generated object URL or a placeholder message when no file is provided.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handlers, and loads stored identities using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and projects through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines custom CSS variables for theming and background styling.
frontend/src/lib/image/canvasUtils.ts: Utility functions for loading images, creating canvases, applying filters, drawing images, and exporting canvas data.
frontend/src/lib/image/localToolProcesso: Implements local image-processing pipelines for various tools, including logo generation and effect application based on input and config.
frontend/src/lib/tools/toolConfigs.ts: Defines interfaces for tool presets and settings and provides detailed configuration for tools like logo-maker and mockup-creator.
frontend/src/lib/tools/toolHelpText.ts: Provides descriptive help text strings for each tool identified by tool ID.
frontend/src/lib/tools/toolRegistry.ts: Registers all available tools with metadata such as name, route path, category, input mode, and icon.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity context before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the dashboard with hero section, recent projects, and categorized tool listings.
frontend/src/pages/MyProjectsPage.tsx: Displays user projects with view and delete actions, handling authentication and project management.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectDetailsPage.ts: Displays and manages a project's details, including fetching, renaming, and deleting a project with UI controls.
frontend/src/pages/tools/AgeTransformati: Loads the Age Transformation Filter tool in ToolStudio with edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/AIRetouchPage.t: Loads the AI Retouch tool in ToolStudio with edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ArchitecturalDe: Loads the Architectural Design Visualizer tool in ToolStudio with hybrid mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/BabyKidsPhotoEd: Loads the Baby & Kids Photo Editor tool in ToolStudio with edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/BackgroundRemov: Loads the Background Removal tool in ToolStudio with edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/BannerDesignPag: Loads the Banner Design tool in ToolStudio with generation mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/BarbershopStyli: Loads the Barbershop Stylist tool in ToolStudio with edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/BigHeadCaricatu: Loads the Big Head Caricature Generator tool in ToolStudio with edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/CollageMakerPag: Loads the Collage Maker tool in ToolStudio with hybrid mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/FashionModelGen: Loads the Fashion Model Generator tool in ToolStudio with generation mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/FilterUsiaAgeFi: Loads the Filter Usia Age Filter tool in ToolStudio with edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/GraduationPhoto: Loads the Graduation Photo Editor tool in ToolStudio with edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/IDPhotoBoothPag: Loads the ID Photo Booth tool in ToolStudio with edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/InfographicPost: Loads the Infographic Poster Creator tool in ToolStudio with generation mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/LogoMakerPage.t: Loads the Logo Maker tool in ToolStudio with generation mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/MagicEraserPage: Loads the Magic Eraser tool in ToolStudio with edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/MaternityPhotoE: Loads the Maternity Photo Editor tool in ToolStudio with edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/MiniWorldGenera: Loads the Mini World Generator tool in ToolStudio with generation mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/MockupCreatorPa: Loads the Mockup Creator tool in ToolStudio with hybrid mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/OutpaintingPage: Loads the Outpainting tool in ToolStudio with edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/PhotoRestoratio: Loads the Photo Restoration tool in ToolStudio with edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/POVHandCreatorP: Loads the POV Hand Creator tool in ToolStudio with hybrid mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ProductPhotogra: Loads the Product Photographer tool in ToolStudio with edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ReligiousEventP: Loads the Religious Event Photo Editor tool in ToolStudio with edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/SketchPencilArt: Loads the Sketch & Pencil Art tool in ToolStudio with edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/WeddingPreweddi: Loads the Wedding & Prewedding Editor tool in ToolStudio with edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/ToolsCatalogPage.tsx: Renders a categorized grid of all available tools with icons, descriptions, and navigation links.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS settings, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s versioned state and lists required app features, including the overall app shell, a catalog of many AI tools, and per‑tool presets, configuration options, and workspace expectations.
